analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0x09186c6f2b1eb74d4510a3ae062dc2d9963f2697.sol:
	Contract Chamacoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x09186c6f2b1eb74d4510a3ae062dc2d9963f2697.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0x09186c6f2b1eb74d4510a3ae062dc2d9963f2697.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
